metadata.description: Balanced test set for taxonomy classification with 200 samples across 10 categories

samples.text: Introduction to neural networks and deep learning architectures. This comprehensive guide covers feedforward networks, convolutional neural networks, and recurrent neural networks. Learn about backpropagation, gradient descent optimization, and regularization techniques.
Quantum computing fundamentals: qubits, superposition, and entanglement. Explore quantum gates, quantum circuits, and quantum algorithms including Shor's algorithm and Grover's search algorithm.
Database design principles and normalization. Understanding first, second, and third normal forms. Entity-relationship diagrams, ACID properties, and transaction management in relational databases.
Web development with React and modern JavaScript. Component-based architecture, hooks, state management with Redux, and server-side rendering with Next.js.
Cybersecurity best practices: encryption, authentication, and authorization. Understanding common vulnerabilities like SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF attacks. Implementing secure coding practices.
Cloud computing architectures on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Microservices, containerization with Docker, orchestration with Kubernetes, and serverless computing patterns.
Data structures and algorithms: arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, and hash tables. Time complexity analysis, Big O notation, and algorithm optimization strategies.
Natural language processing techniques: tokenization, part-of-speech tagging, named entity recognition, and sentiment analysis. Transformer models like BERT and GPT for text understanding.
Computer vision fundamentals: image processing, feature extraction, object detection, and image segmentation. Convolutional neural networks for visual recognition tasks.
Blockchain technology and distributed ledger systems. Consensus mechanisms, smart contracts, cryptocurrency fundamentals, and decentralized applications.
Advanced machine learning: ensemble methods including random forests, gradient boosting, and XGBoost. Feature engineering, cross-validation, and hyperparameter tuning strategies.
Quantum error correction codes and fault-tolerant quantum computation. Surface codes, stabilizer codes, and the threshold theorem for quantum computing.
NoSQL databases: MongoDB, Cassandra, and Redis. Document stores, column-family stores, key-value stores, and graph databases. CAP theorem and eventual consistency.
Frontend performance optimization: code splitting, lazy loading, tree shaking, and bundle size reduction. Web vitals, lighthouse scores, and progressive web applications.
Penetration testing methodologies and ethical hacking. Reconnaissance, scanning, exploitation, and post-exploitation techniques. OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities.
Infrastructure as code with Terraform and CloudFormation. Automated deployment pipelines, blue-green deployments, and canary releases in cloud environments.
Dynamic programming techniques for optimization problems. Memoization, tabulation, and solving classic problems like knapsack, longest common subsequence, and edit distance.
Attention mechanisms and transformer architectures in NLP. Self-attention, multi-head attention, positional encoding, and pre-training strategies for language models.
Semantic segmentation and instance segmentation in computer vision. U-Net, Mask R-CNN, and DeepLab architectures for pixel-level classification.
Decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and automated market makers. Liquidity pools, yield farming, and smart contract security in blockchain applications.
Supervised learning algorithms: linear regression, logistic regression, support vector machines, and decision trees. Model evaluation metrics and confusion matrices.
Quantum annealing and adiabatic quantum computation. D-Wave systems, QUBO formulations, and optimization problems in quantum computing.
Database indexing strategies: B-trees, hash indexes, and full-text search indexes. Query optimization and execution plans in SQL databases.
RESTful API design principles and GraphQL. HTTP methods, status codes, authentication with JWT, and API versioning strategies.
Network security protocols: TLS/SSL, IPSec, and VPNs. Firewall configurations, intrusion detection systems, and security information and event management.
Serverless architectures with AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, and Google Cloud Functions. Event-driven computing, cold starts, and function composition patterns.
Graph algorithms: breadth-first search, depth-first search, Dijkstra's algorithm, and minimum spanning trees. Applications in network analysis and routing.
Word embeddings and distributed representations: Word2Vec, GloVe, and FastText. Semantic similarity and analogy tasks in natural language processing.
Object detection architectures: YOLO, SSD, and Faster R-CNN. Real-time detection, anchor boxes, and non-maximum suppression in computer vision.
Consensus algorithms in distributed systems: Proof of Work, Proof of Stake, and Byzantine Fault Tolerance. Blockchain scalability and layer-2 solutions.
Reinforcement learning fundamentals: Markov decision processes, Q-learning, and policy gradients. Applications in game playing and robotics.
Quantum cryptography and quantum key distribution. BB84 protocol, quantum teleportation, and post-quantum cryptography algorithms.
Database sharding and partitioning strategies. Horizontal scaling, consistent hashing, and distributed database architectures.
Server-side rendering vs client-side rendering. Hydration, static site generation, and incremental static regeneration in modern web frameworks.
Zero-trust security architecture and micro-segmentation. Identity and access management, privileged access management, and security orchestration.
Multi-cloud strategies and cloud-native application design. Service mesh architectures, observability, and distributed tracing in microservices.
Sorting algorithms: quicksort, mergesort, heapsort, and radix sort. Stability, in-place sorting, and average-case vs worst-case complexity analysis.
Machine translation and sequence-to-sequence models. Encoder-decoder architectures, beam search, and evaluation metrics like BLEU score.
Generative adversarial networks for image synthesis. Generator and discriminator architectures, training stability, and applications in style transfer.
Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and digital asset ownership. ERC-721 and ERC-1155 standards, metadata storage, and marketplace implementations.
Unsupervised learning: k-means clustering, hierarchical clustering, and dimensionality reduction with PCA and t-SNE.
Variational quantum eigensolver and quantum approximate optimization algorithm. Hybrid quantum-classical algorithms for near-term quantum devices.
Time-series databases: InfluxDB, TimescaleDB, and Prometheus. Data retention policies, downsampling, and continuous queries.
WebAssembly and high-performance web applications. Compiling C/C++/Rust to WASM, memory management, and JavaScript interoperability.
Application security testing: static analysis (SAST), dynamic analysis (DAST), and interactive analysis (IAST). DevSecOps integration.
Edge computing and fog computing architectures. Content delivery networks, edge caching, and distributed computing at the network edge.
String matching algorithms: Knuth-Morris-Pratt, Boyer-Moore, and Rabin-Karp. Pattern matching and text search optimization.
Question answering systems and reading comprehension. SQuAD dataset, extractive vs abstractive QA, and retrieval-augmented generation.
3D computer vision: point cloud processing, depth estimation, and 3D reconstruction. SLAM algorithms and structure from motion.
Cross-chain interoperability and blockchain bridges. Atomic swaps, wrapped tokens, and multi-chain protocols.
Transfer learning and fine-tuning pre-trained models. Domain adaptation, few-shot learning, and meta-learning approaches.
Quantum machine learning: quantum neural networks, quantum kernel methods, and variational quantum classifiers.
Database replication and high availability. Master-slave replication, multi-master replication, and conflict resolution strategies.
CSS Grid and Flexbox layouts. Responsive design patterns, mobile-first development, and CSS-in-JS solutions.
Cryptographic hash functions and digital signatures. SHA-256, HMAC, RSA, and elliptic curve cryptography.
Container orchestration with Kubernetes. Pods, services, deployments, and StatefulSets. Helm charts and GitOps workflows.
Divide and conquer algorithms. Merge sort, quick sort, binary search, and Strassen's matrix multiplication.
Text summarization techniques: extractive and abstractive summarization. ROUGE metrics and evaluation of summary quality.
Image classification with convolutional neural networks. ResNet, VGG, and EfficientNet architectures. Transfer learning with ImageNet.
Smart contract development with Solidity. Gas optimization, security patterns, and common vulnerabilities in Ethereum contracts.
Neural architecture search and AutoML. Hyperparameter optimization with Bayesian optimization and genetic algorithms.
Topological quantum computing and anyons. Majorana fermions, braiding operations, and fault-tolerant quantum gates.
ACID vs BASE consistency models. Eventual consistency, strong consistency, and consistency trade-offs in distributed databases.
State management in React applications. Context API, Redux, MobX, and Zustand. When to use local vs global state.
Threat modeling and risk assessment. STRIDE methodology, attack trees, and security requirements engineering.
Cloud cost optimization strategies. Reserved instances, spot instances, auto-scaling policies, and resource tagging.
Greedy algorithms and optimization. Activity selection, Huffman coding, and minimum spanning tree algorithms.
Named entity recognition and information extraction. CRF models, BiLSTM-CRF, and transformer-based NER systems.
Video understanding and action recognition. 3D CNNs, two-stream networks, and temporal modeling in computer vision.
Layer-2 scaling solutions: Lightning Network, Plasma, and Optimistic Rollups. Blockchain throughput and transaction finality.
Anomaly detection and outlier analysis. Isolation forests, one-class SVM, and autoencoders for unsupervised anomaly detection.
Quantum simulation of molecular systems. Variational quantum eigensolver for chemistry, quantum phase estimation, and Hamiltonian simulation.
Database connection pooling and performance tuning. Query caching, prepared statements, and connection lifecycle management.
TypeScript for type-safe JavaScript development. Interfaces, generics, type inference, and advanced type system features.
Security operations center (SOC) and incident response. SIEM platforms, threat intelligence, and security playbooks.
Cloud-native storage solutions. Object storage (S3), block storage (EBS), and file storage (EFS). Storage classes and lifecycle policies.
Backtracking algorithms for constraint satisfaction problems. N-queens, Sudoku solver, and graph coloring.
Dialogue systems and conversational AI. Intent classification, slot filling, and dialogue state tracking in chatbots.
Facial recognition and biometric authentication. Face detection, face alignment, and deep face embeddings for verification.
Decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) and governance mechanisms. Voting systems, treasury management, and on-chain governance.
Model interpretability and explainable AI. SHAP values, LIME, attention visualization, and feature importance analysis.
Quantum supremacy and quantum advantage. Benchmarking quantum computers, random circuit sampling, and near-term applications.
Graph databases and property graph models. Neo4j, Cypher query language, and graph traversal algorithms.
Web accessibility (a11y) and WCAG guidelines. Screen readers, keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, and inclusive design.
Malware analysis and reverse engineering. Static analysis, dynamic analysis, sandboxing, and behavioral detection.
Cloud disaster recovery and business continuity. Backup strategies, RTO/RPO objectives, and multi-region failover.
Computational geometry algorithms. Convex hull, line intersection, closest pair of points, and Voronoi diagrams.
Sentiment analysis and opinion mining. Aspect-based sentiment analysis, emotion detection, and stance detection in text.
Medical image analysis and diagnostic AI. X-ray classification, CT scan segmentation, and pathology detection with deep learning.
Zero-knowledge proofs and privacy-preserving protocols. zk-SNARKs, zk-STARKs, and confidential transactions in blockchain.
Federated learning and privacy-preserving machine learning. Differential privacy, secure multi-party computation, and distributed model training.
Quantum entanglement and Bell inequalities. EPR paradox, quantum non-locality, and applications in quantum communication.
Database migration strategies and schema evolution. Blue-green deployments, rolling migrations, and backward compatibility.
Progressive web apps and service workers. Offline functionality, push notifications, and app-like experiences on the web.
Cloud security posture management and compliance. CIS benchmarks, SOC 2, ISO 27001, and automated security auditing.
Serverless databases and managed database services. Aurora Serverless, DynamoDB, and Firestore for cloud-native applications.
Approximation algorithms for NP-hard problems. Vertex cover, traveling salesman, and set cover approximations.
Text generation with language models. Beam search, nucleus sampling, and controllable generation techniques.
Optical character recognition (OCR) and document understanding. Text detection, text recognition, and layout analysis.
Blockchain scalability trilemma: decentralization, security, and scalability. Sharding, state channels, and sidechains.
Time series forecasting with ARIMA, LSTM, and Prophet. Seasonality detection, trend analysis, and prediction intervals.
Quantum sensors and metrology. Atomic clocks, quantum magnetometers, and precision measurements with quantum systems.
Distributed transactions and two-phase commit. Saga pattern, eventual consistency, and compensating transactions.
WebSockets and real-time communication. Server-sent events, WebRTC, and building real-time collaborative applications.
Container security and image scanning. Vulnerability assessment, runtime protection, and secure container registries.
Cloud monitoring and observability. Metrics, logs, traces, and distributed tracing with OpenTelemetry.
Randomized algorithms and probabilistic analysis. Monte Carlo methods, Las Vegas algorithms, and expected runtime analysis.
Coreference resolution and entity linking. Pronoun resolution, mention detection, and knowledge base linking in NLP.
Autonomous driving perception systems. Lane detection, traffic sign recognition, and pedestrian detection with computer vision.
Tokenomics and cryptocurrency economics. Supply mechanisms, incentive design, and game theory in blockchain protocols.
Batch normalization and layer normalization in neural networks. Training stability, internal covariate shift, and normalization techniques.
Quantum algorithms for linear systems. HHL algorithm, quantum matrix inversion, and applications in machine learning.
Database backup and recovery strategies. Point-in-time recovery, incremental backups, and disaster recovery testing.
Micro-frontends and modular web architecture. Module federation, independent deployments, and team autonomy in large applications.
API security best practices. OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, rate limiting, and API gateway security patterns.
Cloud networking fundamentals. VPCs, subnets, security groups, and network ACLs. VPN and Direct Connect configurations.
Amortized analysis of data structures. Aggregate method, accounting method, and potential method for algorithm analysis.
Dependency parsing and syntactic analysis. Transition-based parsing, graph-based parsing, and universal dependencies.
Image super-resolution and enhancement. SRCNN, ESRGAN, and perceptual loss functions for high-quality image upscaling.
Interplanetary File System (IPFS) and decentralized storage. Content addressing, DHT, and peer-to-peer file sharing.
Gradient descent optimization algorithms. SGD, Adam, RMSprop, and learning rate scheduling strategies.
Quantum networking and quantum internet. Quantum repeaters, entanglement distribution, and quantum communication protocols.
In-memory databases and caching strategies. Redis, Memcached, and cache invalidation patterns.
Testing strategies for web applications. Unit testing, integration testing, end-to-end testing with Cypress and Playwright.
Blockchain forensics and transaction analysis. Address clustering, deanonymization techniques, and on-chain analytics.
Infrastructure monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana. Metrics collection, alerting rules, and dashboard creation.
Network flow algorithms. Maximum flow, minimum cut, Ford-Fulkerson algorithm, and bipartite matching.
Multilingual NLP and cross-lingual transfer. mBERT, XLM-R, and zero-shot cross-lingual classification.
Pose estimation and human activity recognition. OpenPose, keypoint detection, and skeleton-based action recognition.
Blockchain consensus mechanisms comparison. PoW vs PoS vs DPoS vs PBFT. Energy efficiency and security trade-offs.
